name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the EKS cluster. Must be unique and up to 50 characters.

region.title: Region
region.description: AWS region where the EKS cluster will be provisioned.

vpc_cidr.title: VPC CIDR
vpc_cidr.description: The CIDR block for the VPC that will be created for the cluster.

auth_mode.title: Authentication Mode
auth_mode.description: Authentication method for the cluster. Options: API, CONFIG_MAP, or both.

enable_irsa.title: Enable IRSA
enable_irsa.description: Enable IAM Roles for Service Accounts (IRSA) to securely access AWS services.

public_access.title: Allow public access
public_access.description: Determines whether the EKS control plane endpoint is publicly accessible.

resource_tags.title: Resource Tags
resource_tags.description: Tags that will be applied to all Kubernetes resources created by the cluster.

team.title: Team
team.description: The owning team of the resources for visibility and management.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Deployment environment for the cluster resources (e.g., production, QA).

cluster_version.title: Cluster Version
cluster_version.description: Kubernetes version to use for the EKS cluster.

availability_zones.title: Availability Zones
availability_zones.description: List of availability zones to distribute worker nodes across for high availability.

private_access_cidrs.title: Private access CIDRs
private_access_cidrs.description: CIDR blocks that can access the private Kubernetes API endpoint, if enabled.
